name: wePaint
desc: wePaint is a in wip, v1 should be out around september. It is an ambitious project aiming at filling a hole in the art market.

name: Meetche
desc: Meetche is a new way to see matching apps. Based on your passions, Meetche lets you connect with people and meet them at events planned by Meetche.

name: Gautier's Portfolio
desc: A creative portfolio for a creative designer. Gautier and myself worked together to offer an immersive experience, reinventing the navigation codes to create a minimalist journey

name: Confettis
desc: You want a mini party on your screen? Try confettis! Drag and drop to throw some confettis!
